room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Escape U in St. Augustine
room_description:
You are vacationing with your family in beautiful St Augustine, FL when everything goes black. When you awaken, you notice you are restrained and have a hood over your head. Your captors force feed you some sort of pill just before throwing you onto the cold concrete floor and slamming the door.
You find a way to remove your hood and take inventory of your surroundings. You've been separated from your family and are isolated in a 10 by 10 white padded cell. You begin to formulate a plan to escape but just as you do the side effects of the force-fed medication start kicking in and everything changes. You must find a way to escape this new hell, all the while battling the side effects of the medication which begins to make you question your own sanity.
